name: Divine Benediction of Indomitable Lovers
description:
Wives, joined in marriage, must protect their love together.  Strike away enemies and defend your heart. Defeating your foes will reward you.

Controls
  • WASD / Arrows to move.
  • Space to change rotation.
  • Esc to pause the game.
Attribution
  • Programming and SFX by me
  • Art by breadotop
  • 8-BIT WONDER font by Joiro Hatagaya
  • Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

(In case you run into trouble, press 'P' once the game starts to give yourself 99 lives.)

Made for GMTK 2021 in 48 hours.
